parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Numerator of the scale ratio ( n :n)

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Denominator of the scale ratio (n: n )

title: IView3D.Get3DViewAnnotationTextScale
description: Gets the annotation text scale for this 3D View.
signature:
void Get3DViewAnnotationTextScale( 
   out System.Double
Scale1
,
   out System.Double
Scale2
)

parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Numerator of the scale ratio ( n :n)

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Denominator of the scale ratio (n: n )

remarks:
This method gets the
Text scale
on the Annotation Properties dialog that appears when you RMB on the Annotations folder in the FeatureManager design tree.
